Text: #G22# As a PI, I want to properly record all metadata, so that I can ensure proper running of the project in case of staff changes.
#G22# As a PI, I want to plan what kind of data I want to record/store, so that I can ensure it will possible to store it.
#G22# As a PI, I want to record information about my DMP, so that an Ethics Committee can review this for compliance with ethical standards.
#G22# As a data manager, I want to know which kind of data types will be produced or collected, so that I can determine what basic support services and functionalities are required.
#G22# As an IT staff member, I want to know which kind of data types will be produced or collected, so that I can determine what basic support services and functionalities are required.
#G22# As a research head, I want to access to the persistent identifiers of datasets provided in the DMP, so that I can check that the DMP has been implemented.
Action: Access To The Persistent Identifiers Of Datasets In The Dmp

Text: #G22# As a metadata manager, I want to have a short description of project, so that I can be informed about the metadata description.
Action: Have A Short Description Of Project

Text: #G22# As a data manager, I want to know the time plan for collecting data, so that I can plan the data management.
Action: Know The Time Plan Collecting Data

Text: #G22# As an archivemanager, I want to reuse the information regarding file format, so that I can apply automated checks for the file validation.
Action: Reuse The Information Regarding File Format

Text: #G22# As a researcher, I want to extract the description of the data collected, so that I can reuse it for the writing of a data paper.
Action: Extract The Description Of The Data

Text: #G22# As a researcher, I want to link research publications in the institutional repository or CRIS with DMP records, so that I can generate reports of research output resulting from a project.
Action: Link Research Publications In The Institutional Repository With Dmp Records

Text: #G22# As a repository operator, I want to know about the kind of data, so that I can evaluate the storage size and system.
Action: Know About The Kind Of Data

Text: #G22# As an IT staff member, I want to know with which software or technology the data is produced or used, so that I can determine what kind of technical services and functionalities are required.
#G22# As a data manager, I want to know whether the data can be reproduced efficiently, so that I can determine whether and how the data has to be stored.
#G22# As a data manager, I want to know the security requirements of the data, so that I can check whether the data can be kept secure.
Action: Know The Security Requirements Of The Data

Text: #G22# As a researcher, I want to record my intention to share data I have collected under terms of a particular licence, so that other researchers who use the data understand the rights of use.
Action: Collected Under Terms Of A Particular Licence
